full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYIS BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI KHA @005B CIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZOR BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING GTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PAR GCIG BYAS MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GRA BSKUL BZHIN NGOR, SLAR SGRON PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYI SBYIN BDAG GI RIM 'GRO DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I DO MA CHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL PA MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA AE SRID SNYI MA'I SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS KYI BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN PAS SUG BRIS SU BGYI PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I DAR ZHING RGYAS LA @006A *, ,YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,'DI BRIS PA'I BDAG DANG 'GRO BA SGRIB SBYANGS TSOGS RDZOGS KUN MKHYEN MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
